title: Heaven Dust 2
description:
Heaven Dust 2 download PC Game In Direct Link for free on SteamRIP
This is the stand-alone sequel to the survival horror thriller Heaven Dust (it is not mandatory to play the previous game to enjoy this one). After a press conference, a virus outbreak happens in the mysterious First Research Center. In the meantime, deep inside the institute, Steve wakes up from his cryogenic pod. He finds himself trapped in a living hell, surrounded by zombies , again. He must fight his way out even when the dreadful truth is also approaching.
